required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Histological Study Evaluating Silk Voice and Crosslinked Hyaluronic Acid
clinical_study.official_title: A Histological Study Evaluating Silk Voice and Crosslinked Hyaluronic Acid

brief_summary.textblock: The primary study goal is to evaluate the histological characteristic of Silk Voice to evaluate the potential for Silk Voice to deliver long-term results to patients.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary study goal is to evaluate the histological characteristic of Silk Voice at a surrogate implantation site to evaluate the potential for Silk Voice to deliver long-term results to patients. Information obtained from this study will help clinician determine Silk Voice's treatment duration and whether Silk Voice is appropriate for their patient.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Each subject enrolled will receive implantation of both Silk Voice and control material.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects exhibiting histological evidence of newly deposited tissue compared to control implantation.
primary_outcome.description: Tissue samples extracted at 6 -month time points will be qualitatively evaluated for presence of tissue deposition. Changes in tissue composition will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects exhibiting histological evidence of newly deposited tissue compared to control implantation.
primary_outcome.description: Tissue samples extracted at 12 -month time points will be qualitatively evaluated for presence of tissue deposition. Changes in tissue composition will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects exhibiting histological evidence of newly deposited tissue compared to control implantation.
primary_outcome.description: Tissue samples extracted at 24 -month time points will be qualitatively evaluated for presence of tissue deposition. Changes in tissue composition will be assessed.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient and number of reported adverse events reported
secondary_outcome.description: Localized adverse event associated with material implantation. The number of patients and type of adverse events will be evaluated.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient and number of reported adverse events reported
secondary_outcome.description: Localized adverse event associated with material implantation. The number of patients and type of adverse events will be evaluated.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient and number of reported adverse events reported
secondary_outcome.description: Localized adverse event associated with material implantation. The number of patients and type of adverse events will be evaluated.

arm_group.description: Silk Voice and control material are implanted. The implanted material is explanted at 6 months.
Silk Voice and control material are implanted. The implanted material is explanted at 12 months.
Silk Voice and control material are implanted. The implanted material is explanted at 24 months.

intervention.description: Silk Voice comprised of silk protein and cross-linked hyaluronic acid (HA)
